name: H.U.S.S. - Hyper Ultra Space Saga
description:
Customize your spaceship and protect your planet from asteroids and aliens!


Mouse - Camera control

Left Mouse Button - Action/Shoot

Space bar - Thrust

I've worked alone in this game but I used some third-party assets:

Font: Mini Pixel 7 by Style-7.

Plugin: Epic Leaderboard.

Music: Space Fighter Loop & Space 1990B by Kevin MacLeod.


Credits goes for: 
Unreal Engine and Epic Games;

gamesplusjames for hosting GamesPlusJam 2;

Fernanda, my girlfriend for all the support.
